summary: Adds a new mage follower, Fea Rana.
descriptionHtml:
This mod is for those who mainly want a mage follower who also uses staves and one-handed weapons.Fea Rana can be located nere the Mages College (for specific location see make above). This follower has the ability to use some master level spells (for more detail there is a journal in the Fea Rana\'s inventory that explains the backstory some. 

Mod Features
================
Fea Rana (follower)
several staffs with new enchantments
Journal of Fea Rana
new shrine of Boethiah 
follower comes equiped with some master level spells



If anyone has any questions please feel free to leave them in the comments below. 
As before this mod will be posted on both the Nexus site as well as on Steam under the same name.



Notes:
=======
-For the follower to look like the pictures, use /Better Females by Bella/ and /YY anim replacer.(They are  not required however)

-Feel free to post screenshots of the mod

-If you have any comments about the mod be sure to post them.

-Also if you have any requests for other mods or how to improve this mod, leave them in the comment section and I will see what I can do.


Updates:
==========
-v1.2: adds a new camp where the follower can be found in (This was a request given in the comments)
author: Ghostrunner24
